00065 namespace boost {
00066 namespace xint {
00067 namespace detail {
00069 
00070 inline std::size_t log10_bits(std::size_t bits) {
00071     // large_step and count_per_large_step are based on a minimum-32-bit integer
00072     assert(std::numeric_limits<boost::intmax_t>::digits >= 32);
00073 
00074     typedef raw_integer_t<0, false, std::allocator<digit_t> > T;
00075     const T large_step(1000000000), small_step(10);
00076     const std::size_t count_per_large_step = 9, count_per_small_step = 1;
00077 
00078     T n;
00079     pow2(n, bits);
00080     --n;
00081 
00082     std::size_t r = 0;
00083     while (n >= large_step) { n /= large_step; r += count_per_large_step; }
00084     while (n >= small_step) { n /= small_step; r += count_per_small_step; }
00085     return r;
00086 }
00087 
00088 template <typename charT>
00089 const std::basic_string<charT>& nan_text() {
00090     static std::basic_string<charT> r;
00091     if (r.empty()) {
00092         std::basic_ostringstream<charT> out;
00093         out << "#NaN#";
00094         r = out.str();
00095     }
00096     return r;
00097 }
00098 
00099 template <typename charT>
00100 bool is_nan_text(const std::basic_string<charT> str) {
00101     return (str == nan_text<charT>());
00102 }
